ldi $r0 0x0040
0xc040: 1100000001000000
ldi $r1 0x0101
0xc301: 1100001100000001
sl $r1 4
0x7204: 0111001000000100
ldi $r2 0x000f
0xc40f: 1100010000001111
ldi $r3 0x00f0
0xc6f0: 1100011011110000
ldi $r4 0x0000
0xc800: 1100100000000000
ldi $r5 0x0010
0xca10: 1100101000010000
ldi $r6 0x0005
0xcc05: 1100110000000101
LO: move $r6 $r6
0xad80: 1010110110000000
brnz EXIT
0xc1e: 0000110000011110
subi $r6 1
0x4c01: 0100110000000001
ldr $r4 $r6
0xa981: 1010100110000001
subi $r4 0x0100
0x4900: 0100100100000000
brnz ELSE
0xc0c: 0000110000001100
sra $r0 3
0x9003: 1001000000000011
or $r1 $r1 $r0
0x2242: 0010001001000010
ldi $r7 0x00ff
0xceff: 1100111011111111
sl $r7 8
0x7e08: 0111111000001000
str $r5 $r7
0xabc2: 1010101111000010
jmp FI
0xf006: 1111000000000110
ELSE: sl $r2 2
0x7402: 0111010000000010
xor $r3 $r3 $r2
0x26d3: 0010011011010011
sti $r5 0x00ff
0xbaff: 1011101011111111
FI: addi $r5 2
0x3a02: 0011101000000010
jmp LO
0xffde: 1111111111011110
EXIT: hlt
0xa007: 1010000000000111
